reviews_data.review_text: Great place for a quick bite. When one person is working you'll wait a minute. But even then. Great food and great service.
Very good breakfast sandeich

I can't believe this place has 4.5 stars! Over priced and most definitely not worth a second try. Waited over an hour for a Vietnamese coffee and a croissant. The coffee was horribly wrong. It's supposed to be sweetened with condensed milk. It had maybe 1/2 a tea spoon worth. The croissant was burned dry and just over done. Not worth the wait!
Super chill coffee bar off the beaten path.
Good coffee..sweet tea taste like poison.

takes entirely too long for 1 caramel iced coffee with extra caramel . its never made correctly, what's so hard about my simple caramel iced coffee, and today when I went back in and asked for more caramel in my iced coffee, the barista put something else in it instead of caramel and it tasted awful! total waste of $7 I will never return
Staff was friendly and the drink was pretty good. A little pricey, but beats the pants off Starbucks. Can't wait to go back!

Great coffee and great ambience. I would suggest trying their seasonal beverages. It's a peaceful place to sit and work. You get some pastries and quite bite options here. We tried their macaroons. While the taste was great, the texture was chewy rather than airy.
Great coffee and quiet place‚Ä¶ it would be nice if they keep the outside tables cleaner
Nice place for coffee, ice cream and simple sandwiches.

I went to this Waterbean on Monday September 26 around 10:45 am and there was a guy working. I asked for extra oat milk in my coffee and even paid for it, as my cup of coffee was $10.00 for a vanilla latte. I received my drink and it didn't the extra oat milk, so I asked for a little more. His response was ‚Äúoh well milk prices are really high right now.‚Äù I was very confused as I've never received that response from any restaurant/coffee shop. This was one of the worst customer service experiences I've ever had. Do not go in here if he's working.
A wonderful coffee shop! Great coffee, friendly baristas! The tea selection is nothing to skip over! Definitely a shop you need to visit!

Iced coffee, smoothies, and croissants were all a huge hit in my group. The place is cute and the employees were kind. Some of the macarons were great and soft as they should be, but some of them were actually hard leading me to believe they were a couple days old since they're usually soft for a couple days after being made or defrosted.

Horrible coffee , ordered pumpkin spice latte with oat milk and I paid $7.50 with tax for that. It literally tasted like a k-cup hot chocolate with artificial flavoring that I wasn't able to distinguish and tell what it is. You want good coffee this isn't the place.
Local coffee at its finest! Choose between light/medium/dark roast espresso - all three are delicious! Only one guy running the place but he is super fast and friendly. Highly recommend :)

Coffee was delicious, and they even had a vegan orange-chocolate muffin! I got a mocha with macadamia milk and the texture was perfect.  Customer service was great. Would definitely come again; it is a wonderful environment.
Great vibe, great service, great breakfast sandwich, fantastic drink combos, I love it here!

My and my coworkers have been coming here for years. There was ONE time where the macarons weren't fresh and they immediately fixed it. I love coming here and I don't think I've ever had anything I didn't enjoy. Definitely should give them a try if you're in the area.

I truly had an amazing experience here. I was in town for job training and the night before I ate here was just awful. So when I woke up and found this place I was so excited to give it a try! Their drinks are amazing and their breakfast was so yummy. I got there as soon as they opened and the lady working was so nice and helpful. If I ever return to Charlotte I will absolutely come back here!

Absolutely horrible customer service. I went in this morning there were 2 employees and 2 customer (I was one of the two). I asked for a turkey, egg, & cheese croissant. I am pregnant and pregnant women cannot eat deli meat unless it is cooked. I asked the cashier if they could put the meat on the skillet to make it safe to eat for my child. As the other employee was 3 steps away frying an egg on a skillet she said "No, she could not do that because she might burn herself." You could burn yourself frying an egg, or using the toaster (as she was currently doing). If she is that incompetent she probably shouldnt be cooking anything. It was laziness and racial profiling. I will NEVER go to waterbean again. Moms all over ban this place. They care less about you or your babies!
Barista was polite and honest about drink recommendations. Iced Coffee is strong and tastes good! I'll be visiting again next time I'm in the area ‚òïÔ∏è

Not usually in this area but it was convenient and breakfast is difficult to do poorly. Pretty basic order of drip coffee and a croissant which only list meats so I asked if they come with egg? Yes the barista replied, I ordered the dream which had bacon. While the sandwich is being prepared I added cream to my coffee and it curdled. I tried to let them know the little bit of creamer they had was bad and they should refill it. It was explained to me that creamer always curdles because the coffee is hot and did not want to replace it nor my cup. I then had to explain that I drink coffee every morning for the past 20+ years and I prefer non curdled creamer. I was glad to leave until I checked my sandwich that has no egg. Just a croissant with bacon‚Ä¶ really! Who eats these things? One of them had salami on it, is that even a thing? I could only imagine how the conversation would go when addressing this problem with the non helpful baristas so I chalk it up to a learning experience and will never return to this establishment. Perhaps I can go by another breakfast spot and order some eggs to go on my meatissant and enjoy my curdled coffee. It's a shame because now all the surrounding breakfast options are jumping out at me as I leave‚Ä¶ regrettable
Not sure why these reviews are so high. I'm a bit of a coffee aficionado and the coffee here is very mediocre. I would rather go to Starbucks.
Very nice location and great food!!! Not to mention incredible staff :) Definitely coming here again!!
Creme Brulee Latte was already broken this time :(
Just got a drip coffee there and it was one of the worst I've ever had, second only to a hospital vending machine.   Chain coffeehouses at their worst.
Cute little place and a nice atmosphere. My tea was pretty good.

I stopped in today for the first time. The staff is so inviting and welcoming. Very clean and lovely decor. My daughter got the kids ice cream with sprinkles. She loved it , especially the birthday cake macaroon. I got the green tea frappe, which was amazing along with the croissant ham, egg, and cheese sandwich with spinach. We can't wait to come back and try more things on the menu!
Excellent customer service.  Wonderful selection.  Very clean and well maintained.  Great atmosphere.
Clean place but the barista didn't know what a cortado was and a wobbly chair fell apart.
Great awesome place
Good coffee and a great atmosphere!
Good coffee!!
Great coffee! Very nice ambiance and decor
The coffee is so smooth and delicious.   The macaroons are pretty awesome too.
New to the area and searched for a coffee shop that had variety in there menu. Waterbean coffee has great options of different coffee and surprisingly great food. Will be my go to spot from now on.
Love the ice white mocha and build your own breakfast sandwich that they make fresh or order will definitely go again!!!
Vietnamese coffee was delicious
First time there and was great , there coffee is the best so far way better then Starbucks , be sure to check this place out for all your coffee needs and fixes ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..
Blueberry muffin was delicious and both workers were very sweet. If I have to stop by MEPS again, I'll make sure to head over!
Great little coffee shop off of 485, in the Whitehall business park.
Overall really good. I just didn't know they were going to add Sriracha mayo(?) To my bacon egg and cheese bagel ü§¢ which was an unpleasant surprise.
Expensive

Great place to study/work. Lots of seating inside and outside. Food smelled amazing, coffee was very good. They had chill, ambient, lyricless music playing, which I appreciated since I was trying to work.

The first time we came here it was great, but each successive time we come the service gets worse. Food is fine, Coffee is fine, but there is one particular worker who routinely has a bad attitude. Usually we come in, order, and go sit outside waiting for our food to be brought out to our table. Today, it was packaged to go (we didn't order to go) and just placed up with the mobile orders with no communication at all, so it just sat there until I ventured in to see if the packaged food was indeed ours. It clearly seems that the particular employee does not want to serve any customers on her shift so we are happy to try out the queen city tea bar around the corner next time instead.

Always love coming here. Try out the different espresso roasts! My favorite is the eternity espresso with their hazelnut or coconut syrup. They also have ice cream and breakfast sandwiches, what else could you want?! Clean and spacious with super cute vibes for studying or chatting with friends. Give them a try!
The attitude of a girl serving in the Morning of 8th August was pathetic. If customer asks a question, she should respond properly!
Great coffee
Really good coffee!
Visiting from out of town, was going to traditional Starbucks but I'm glad I didn't‚Ä¶..Amazing!
Great service from Morgan.
Good breakfast but limited choices.
The place is decorated so nicely and created a serene atmosphere. The coffee and other beverage selections are great.
Honestly the best coffee I've ever had, thank you to Morgan and Valeria for making our food and beverages while being so informative and kind! Definitely will come back again
My first time there, delicious iced coffee. It was pretty much empty when I went so service was quick.
Great Iced Creme Brulee coffee  on a hot day!
Atmosphere is so calm and friendly, food is great and service is small town feel.

Nice place. Good coffee. Plenty of parking and no line around the building like the Starbucks down the road. Ice cream if you're not solely interested in caffeine. Friendly staff. Plenty of inside seating and an outside area too.

Such an awesome place! My coworkers and I go here all the time.  Their coffee and croissants are amazing and the boba tea they recently started serving is awesome as well! All staff members are always super polite. I highly recommend Waterbean!
I went there this morning and Morgan was amazing at giving us suggestions and made the best coffee I think I've ever had. Would highly recommend to everyone.
went for the first time today and Morgan was amazing and explained everything perfectly, would 10/10 come back! she did amazing with my latte!

Morgan was super helpful and personable.  She was also very patient with our order since we had a very particular one.  Would definitely come back again because of the customer service, and I don't even drink coffee.

March 2021 Hello you üíõ. I'm not a coffee ‚òïÔ∏è drinker by any means but went to check out this place out with my good friend. Cute, quaint, and nice place with warm lighting and lots of natural lighting through the windows - good place to do work or hang out. The person at the cash register was friendly and informative and told us about the different options and types (French press, Vietnamese style, and Aeropress) of brewing the coffee ‚òïÔ∏è. We ended up getting the coffee flight, which is an array of three types of coffee to your choosing. We got the Honduras, Ethiopia, and Guatemala brews. I'm a basic coffee drinker (ice vanilla latte ü§§ when I do drink) so I didn't really know how much I should've appreciated these different types of coffee. I doused that shiii in cream and sugar ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è so ofc it tasted good in the end haha.  If you're a coffee drinker, I definitely recommend you give this place a try. The vibes are well worth it.

1st time here, coffee was delicious. I ordered the Cream br√ªl√©e iced Latte, strong coffee with pudding at the bottom. Highly recommended. They also serve ice cream and macaroons. Nice place with limited power outlets.
Great coffee and atmosphere.
Nice place. Great drinks. They have MACARONS. And sandwiches.
Good coffee , nice service

Really good place but the stars are due to today's service. Not sure how else to bring this across to whoever runs this place. Walk in with expectation of having drinks and food with my wife and kids. The girl at the counter tells us she can't make the food just the coffee. I had no clue that certain people specialized in specifics. More training needed for these employees to be able to serve full menu.
Great coffee, friendly staff and COVID-19 compliant!
nice place for coffee and hanging
Excellent coffee and the sauce they use on the croissant is amazing!

(Translated by Google) Nice place, excellent attention from the girl, very good coffee and excellent coffee that was what I consumed and what I like the most, it has more options such as different types of ice cream. Free Wi-Fi for customers. Good meeting place.  (Original) Lindo sitio, excelente atenci√≥n de la chica, muy buen caf√© y excelente caf√© que fue lo que consum√≠ y lo que me gusta m√°s, tiene m√°s opciones como distintos tipos de helados. WiFi libre para clientes. Buen sitio de encuentro.

Depending on who is working, the ice coffee is amazing. The lady with the pink hair (sorry I don't know her name) made the most amazing ice coffee. You could taste the coffee and the hint of flavors. But today with going back the flavors are overpowering the coffee and it doesn't taste good.
Best cold brew coffee in Charlotte. Helpful staff, too.

Great breakfast sandwiches, plenty of seating, and strong WiFi. Decent selection of sweets and they have ice cream. Some of the sweets are on a rotation, so if you have a fave they may not have it at certain times. Service can be hit or miss depending on who you get. Coffee is Ok...but it's free refills if you dine in.
My oat milk latte was delicious, staff is friendly, place is cute & clean with outdoor seating and plenty of parking.
Muy rico, very delicious!
Great hidden gem in South Charlotte. Small and quaint with friendly and attentive staff. Love that the sandwiches are made fresh to order. Nice spot for a quick bite and a cup of coffee.
Super cute atmosphere and really good coffee.  Was a good place for a casual business meeting!!
Great place! Really great coffee selection and Macaroons!!
Great espresso! Nice vibe inside. Other options looked good but we didn't try them. Definitely worth it to stop here instead of the million Starbucks in the area.
Amazing portions, perfectly cooked food and one of the best coffees I've had. They even do lunch!
Great coffee, great prices
Delicious coffee!

I was super happy to discover this locally owned joint on my way to a Starbucks. They've got good coffee and (to my surprise) great *actual* food options if you need lunch. Everybody I've encountered is super friendly, and the vibe is airy and relaxed. They've even got an outdoor section. Happy to support this local enterprise
Gteat local spot for coffee. Baristas are really knowledgeable on beans and various drinks.
(Translated by Google) The tastiest and best coffee  (Original) ÿßŸÑÿ∞ ŸàÿßŸÅÿ∂ŸÑ ŸÇŸáŸàŸá
This place is amazing! Close to Steele Creek and it's a hidden gem! Their coffees are brewed literally like the old school coffee shops with pride and care in how it looks in the cup! So good
One of the best coffee shops ive been to in the area.
Enjoy getting coffee from any of their locations. They have macadamia nut milk which is an added bonus.
This place makes Starbucks look like a joke, great hospitality. And you can actually taste the great quality of coffee. All they need is bigger cups.

Lived in this area for years and about time a new coffee shop open up. Great choice of sandwiches and tea. Friendly and welcoming staff.  There's also beer on tap.  The coffee was great. My only issue was that they use american cheese, which we all know isn't cheese, and up charged to use different cheese.

Great coffee. Staff seemed to be new but that's not a problem. Did I mention the coffee was great? Lots of sweet snack options including gluten free as well, although I did not try any. Plenty of parking available and service was pretty quick as well. Would recommend the coffee to anyone and will consider coming back to check out their food options
Had breakfast there.  Very disappointed with the Vietnamese Coffee as it was very weak.  The color of the coffee looks more like tea.
Very lovely place and very fresh!! Great place to relax
Great aeropress and French press brews.  Also, great breakfast sandwich croissants!
Perfect before work and great customer service
Kind people, good coffee, great music playing, calm atmosphere
(Translated by Google) New coffee brand in USA  (Original) Th∆∞∆°ng hi·ªáu c√† fe m·ªõi ·ªü M·ª∏
Very good. Very fresh.
The guys are so sweet. I just love my hot chocolate. Go visit you won't be disappointed.
Can actually make a cappuccino here unlike every other coffee shop
The iced mocha frappuccino is very good, not too much coffee, not too sweet like starbucks & the crossiants are flakey and filling. Service was quick and friendly!
Cold brew is on point!
Great coffee, food, and service
Excellent coffee, great people, and a great food menu, too.

I was visiting the area and wanted to try something new. There was only 1 person in the establishment to take orders, make drinks, cook food, and deliver food to tables, so service was a bit slow.  I ordered their signature Sizzlewich and a sugar free caramel, almond latte. I didn't care for the waterbean sauce, which was just your typical Yum Yum sauce. Overall, it was fairly decent.  The establishment itself was very clean and "modern hippie chic."  The display was various desserts was very tempting.
Loved finding this place that offers craft coffee in the south Charlotte area. They offer Chemex's and single origin coffee and teas!
Great place!
Good quality, great customer service. üëç
Always nice and good prices
Nice coffees on the brew!
The food is amazing and the staff are really personable and have great customer service.. Thank you!!
Great friendly service (9/29/19 AM) and excellent latte.
Cold brew is on point.

I used to love this place. Unfortunately, it seems they've made some changes and not for the better. They used to have really fresh, yummy sushi at a good price. Now, the quality isn't nearly as good and the prices have crept up. Also, not a fan of the new menu/vibe. I suspect some management changes have been made. Such a bummer.

Spent most of my day here getting some work done while traveling. The ambience is so inviting and relaxing. The staff and the food are great! Annie was such a doll. Thank you! Looking forward to visiting again one of your other locations.
Super cool place,  coffee was more than excellent.
Nice coffee, nice people.
Loved it! Excellent hot and cold cafe latte. We also got a BLTS and it hit the spot. Very friendly staff too
Fantastic coffee! I loved the volcano, very different and tasty. I tried coconut in my coffee and it is honestly the best flavor I've added.
Always great coffee
Very tasty coffee, very nice service.
FINALLY an independent coffee shop on the south side of town. fantastic location and great mojo in here. the mocha was stellar and they have gluten free and vegan muffins! will def be returning.
What a delicious breakfast croissant with ham and cheese and an egg. The guy working there made it a work of art. Well Worth the wait.

hmmm.. I ordered a cappuccino but received a beverage that appeared to be an espresso with some milk foam on top of it. Not bad espresso it was but it definitely was not a cappuccino. Weird. Barista skills have some area for improvement.
Great local coffee shop with a solid food menu. Also serves draft beer.
Love the Vietnamese coffee with condensed milk!
A wide assortment of teas and coffee type drinks. There's an outdoor patio you can go for conversation. It has a very relaxing feel just walking in.
Good coffee and ambiance
Eating is plentiful, Good food, good coffee, good service. Parking is a snap.
Macaroons and French Pressed coffee done right!!!!!
Great place and great staff.  The food was great

For my first time been there it was awsome specially becuase of the employees victoria and sarah both helped me explaining the menu and even after i order and got my cofee and food they walked up to me and ask if i needed anything. They both went above and beyond on customer service 10/10 on everything i will come back for sure .

This place is great for coffee, breakfast, lunch, and sweets! I come here all the time for coffee! They're so good and you can tell they take the care to do a good job! The croissant sandwich is one of my fave breakfast items. They started doing sushi and poke bowls here and they're absolutely delicious!
Love their coffee and the ham, salami, cheese and egg croissants with their home sauce.  Awesome customer service from the staff.
Modern minimalist interior. Presentation was on point. However, latte was on the watery side and the sizzlewich was a bit undercooked.

It's smaller and not as cozy as Hunterville location,  but very clean inside.  The girls behind the counter were friendly and welcoming.  The mocha I ordered was absolutely better than Starbucks.  I like how they have different milk alternatives like oatmilk and macadamia nut, which I will try on a future visit. I will definitely return.
Friendly and knowledgeable baristas. They do French press, aeropress, pour overs, siphon brews, cold brew, etc. They do it all!
Friendly staff and FAST SERVICE!!!

Don't know her name, but the newly-made manager (overheard her talking to someone elseüòÉ) yesterday is awesome and very friendly! I would come back to this coffee shop because of her and a nice atmosphere as well as very good coffee!
Cute cafe! Cozy place to chill. Friendly staff! Did a photo shoot there.
Friendly service and delicious coffee & tea!
Such a little gem! Amazing coffee and treats.

Wow!  This is a huge upgrade to a coffee shop!  Stopped by here while I was in town for work.  So glad I stopped by.  Their specialty coffee drink is the Volcano.  It was awesome.  It has layers to it, including a little bit of heat.  Also they do coffee and espresso tastings!  Seriously who does that???  You need to check them out.  Plenty of seating if you want to come, hangout and do some work!

Ordered a BLT and a Chia Latte w/ espresso. On my sandwich I asked for no Tomatoes, I'm allergic to them. The girl at the cash register said ok so no lettuce, told her yes lettuce but no tomatoes. So then she replied ok no mushrooms and do you want mustard or mayo? This went on for about 2 minutes, because she got my order correct no tomatoes or onions or mushrooms since apparently a BLT comes with all of that. Fast forward to when I am back at work about to eat my sandwich, just to see that there was extra tomatoes in my food, if I had eaten that it would've been severe. All in all I would recommend the Latte but I would not recommend the food and if you do then please stress what you do not want on it, even if it does not say it, or else you'll feel like I did during work without a lunch.

Laid back place, very nice place located in shopping center,  few parking spaces in front of it, but additional parking spaces on the opposite side. You can sit inside or outside which is always nice during summer time. The employees were super nice and courteous,  they are willing to redo anything if don't like it, nice place quite place if you wanna read a book, study or just have a nice chat. Their coffee was good as well, they also have a good dessert selection.

Nice atmosphere, but kind of basic with the mod feel. As a passionate barista, I feel the "iced coffee's they're famous for isn't up to par. It tastes burnt similarly like Starbucks. Smoothies we're insane $5 for just some syrup and was so sugary. All the prices are outragous tbh. But I like the Thai tea! :/

What a fantastic place. I pass by all the time. I'm glad I decided to stop. Very serious coffee paired with a sweet helpful staff. I'll become a regular.  Very clean and modern with a fresh pallet of food for a coffe/tea shop. Easy in and out from Arrowood Rd and adjacent business park.
Ducked in here after outlet mall shopping. Great coffee and service!

Pleasantly surprised. Stopped in on a Sunday afternoon and was warmly greeted. Both the iced mocha and Americano were better than expected. Smooth and delicious. It has a friendly atmosphere, limited seating but was a genuinely nice first experience. Lots  of menu options (coffees, espressos, teas, and food items.) Definately worth a repeat visit.
Very clean establishment
Only ordered a breakfast sandwich, but it was really good!
Prices were outrageous in my opinion. I asked about the macarons, they were almost $3 each. I bought a single lunch meal with a strawberry smoothie and spent over $21.

Also known as Sizzlewich, but the coffee here at Waterbean is very good! Had a French Press coffee and it was so smooth. Excellent service as well. Nice relaxing environment with a bar and tables. Come for for some great food and/or coffee!
Great coffee, great food and an awesome atmosphere near Ayrsley. Nice to have quality inn the area vs the overpriced swill that is Starbucks.
